alert.note: Alert for Northern Elko County; South Central Elko County; Southwest Elko County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 13 at 2:31AM PST until January 13 at 10:00PM PST by NWS Elko
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM PST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 10 to 15 inches above 6500 feet and 5 to 10 inches below 6500 feet. Winds gusting as high as 60 mph. * WHERE...Northern Elko County. * WHEN...From 10 PM this evening to 10 PM PST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. Strong winds could cause tree damage. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The combination of continuous snow and gusty winds will create hazardous driving conditions in the advisory area. Travel is discouraged.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Northern Elko County; South Central Elko County; Southwest Elko County
